p: In order to assess the specificity of each kit, 24 respiratory virus-positive samples including 21 NPS samples, and 3 sputum samples were tested for cross-reactivity with human RNA or other respiratory viruses. Samples were determined as positive for a respiratory virus using an Allplex Respiratory Panel 1/2/3 (Seegene). The 24 samples consisted of the human rhinovirus ( n = 9), respiratory syncytial virus B ( n = 6), human adenovirus ( n = 3), human coronavirus 229E ( n = 2), human coronavirus OC43 ( n = 1), human coronavirus NL63 ( n = 1), influenza virus A ( n = 1), and human metapneumovirus ( n = 1).
